He walks over to a kneeling Sora, Donald and Goofy unconscious around them, and he peers down at the boy. Phil runs in with a white towel, but Hades stops him. Cloud raises his sword and Sora closes his eyes, bracing himself. Cloud lowers his sword to Sora’s surprise, and he hears footsteps behind him, turning just as a giant black claw crashes down on him. Sora looks up to see an enormous three-headed beast with red eyes growling over him. Darkness emanates from its jaws, each of its razor sharp teeth bared. Sora gasps as Hades retreats into the barracks
cutscene.sp: Hades Oh, right, there was one other rule I forgot: Accidents happen.
cutscene.desc: The beast moves in to attack Sora, but is pushed back by an incredibly strong man
cutscene.sp: Philoctetes Herc!
cutscene.desc: Hercules holds back the monster, shouting to Phil
cutscene.sp: Hercules Phil, get them out of here!
cutscene.desc: The four of them race out of the Coliseum
cutscene.sp: Philoctetes Whew, that was close! That was Cerberus, the guardian of the Underworld. Herc should be able to handle him. But then again, maybe not... This doesn’t look good. I hope Herc’s okay. Wish I could go in!
cutscene.desc: Sora starts to run back into the Coliseum
cutscene.sp: Philoctetes Kid, you’re not entering the arena, are ya? This ain’t just some match. This is for real!
Sora I’m not afraid. You can decide if I’m hero material or not.
Philoctetes Careful, kid!
cutscene.desc: Sora and company reenters the Coliseum arena, where Hercules has Cloud slung over his shoulder, Cerberus’s giant jaws bearing down on him, inches away. The beast’s ears perk up, hearing their entrance and they turn around, allowing Hercules to run Cloud to the Lobby, past Phil
cutscene.sp: Philoctetes Kid, I got two words of advice for you: Attack!
cutscene.desc: Cerberus roars and stomps around the arena, sending large fireballs at Sora, Donald, and Goofy. Sora manages to stay out of the beast’s path, Donald sending Thunder spells at its three heads. One of the fireballs heads Sora’s way, and he deflects it with his Keyblade, hitting the center head square in the eyes. The beast stops, roaring, and attempts to bite him as he attacks. Backing up, Cerberus rears up on its hind legs, and drops to the ground, sending a shockwave to the trio. Sora heals with a Potion as the beast’s mouth foams with dark energy. It moves forward sending dark matter spewing out of its mouth and into the ground. Sora rolls to dodge as the energy pools and shoots up from under him. Goofy, finding a way on top of the beast, sends his shield flying at the multiple heads. Sora moves in as it tries to bite at Goofy and knocks out the beast, which falls to the ground loudly.
Later, Hercules and Phil are addressing Sora, Donald, and Goofy in the Lobby. Phil reads from a piece of papyrus as Hercules stands with his arms crossed
cutscene.sp: Philoctetes Thus, I do hereby dub thee junior heroes, and confer upon thee full rights and privileges to participate in the games. Further—
Donald Hey! What do you mean junior heroes?
Philoctetes You rookies still don’t understand what it takes to be a true hero.
Goofy So, what does it take?
Hercules Well, that’s just something you’ll have to find out for yourselves. Just the way that I did.
cutscene.desc: He smiles
cutscene.sp: Sora No problem. We’ll start by proving ourselves in the games.
cutscene.desc: Sora smiles, lifting a fist proudly
cutscene.sp: Philoctetes There ain’t gonna be any games for a while.
cutscene.desc: He motions to the closed sign over the arena entrance
cutscene.sp: Philoctetes Gotta clean up the mess from that last battle first.
Sora Okay, we’ll be back.
cutscene.desc: He waves, and the three of them leave as Hercules waves goodbye and Phil strokes his beard
cutscene.sp: Philoctetes I still can’t believe that squirt actually beat Cerberus.
Hercules (to Phil) Just between us, I’d already worn Cerberus down by the time the little guy jumped in.
cutscene.desc: The door closes
cutscene.sp: Philoctetes My lips are sealed.

cutscene.desc: At the Coliseum Gates, Sora sees Cloud sitting near the exit and walks up to him
cutscene.sp: Sora Hey, are you all right?
cutscene.desc: Cloud looks up to see him
cutscene.sp: Cloud Yeah.
Sora So why did you go along with him, anyway?
cutscene.desc: He leans his head pensively on his hands
cutscene.sp: Cloud I’m looking for someone. Hades promised to help. I tried to exploit the power of darkness, but it backfired.
cutscene.desc: He stands up and looks to the sky
cutscene.sp: Cloud I fell into darkness, and I couldn’t find the light.
Sora You’ll find it. I’m searching, too.
cutscene.desc: He looks back at Sora
cutscene.sp: Cloud For your light?
cutscene.desc: Sora nods and Cloud moves closer to him, placing something in his hand
cutscene.sp: Cloud Don’t lose sight of it.
cutscene.desc: He starts to walk away, and Sora nods and looks in his hand
cutscene.sp: Sora How about a rematch sometime? Fair and square, no dark powers involved.
cutscene.desc: He moves toward Cloud, waving his hand in the air. Cloud turns his head, running a hand through his hair
cutscene.sp: Cloud I think I’ll pass.
cutscene.desc: Despite this answer, Sora smiles as Cloud leaves. With Sonic Blade in hand, Sora exits the Coliseum, the doors slamming behind them.
Later that night, Hades stands in the Coliseum Gates, fuming. He holds a Hercules statue in his hand
cutscene.sp: Hades He’s strong, he’s kind.
cutscene.desc: The statue flexes his muscles
cutscene.sp: Hades He’s always there for you, and he’s handsome to boot.
cutscene.desc: The statue crosses his arms and winks
cutscene.sp: Hades He’s perfect. Perfect. Perfectly infuriating! He makes me crazy.
cutscene.desc: Hades turns red, roasting the statue. The hair on his head blazing hot, he explodes in a burst of flames. As the smoke settles around him, he catches his breath and returns to his cool blue shade
cutscene.sp: Hades Wait a minute. What are you worried about? All the pieces are in place. Relax. Here’s what you do. Let Hercules train the kid. In the next games, I’ll take care of them both.
cutscene.desc: He makes a fist as the horned witch appears behind him, her staff held firmly in her hands
cutscene.sp: Hades Who invited you to the party? Stay out of this. This is my show.
?????????? As you wish. Fight to your heart’s content.
cutscene.desc: Hades smirks, nodding, before noting the witch’s tone, and scowling as she disappears.
Sora pilots the Gummi Ship to the next world. They hover over the world and see that it’s a Deep Jungle
cutscene.sp: Goofy Hey, Donald, maybe King Mickey’s down there.
Donald In a backwater place like that? No way! Let’s move on.
Sora Hold on. Riku and Kairi might be down there. Let’s just check it out.
Donald Forget it! We’re on an important mission!
Sora Just land!
Donald No!
Sora Come on!
cutscene.desc: Sora and Donald fight over the controls of the ship
cutscene.sp: Donald Aw, phooey!
Sora We’re landing!
cutscene.desc: The ship starts to shake and decend
cutscene.sp: Donald Don’t touch that! Nooo!

cutscene.desc: The ship hurtles toward the world and Sora falls out of it into a large treehouse, crashing through the roof. He sits on the floor, rubbing his head
cutscene.sp: Sora Oww...my head...
cutscene.desc: He looks around
cutscene.sp: Sora Donald? Goofy?
cutscene.desc: Out of the rafters a claw appears. Sora looks up in time to see a leopard pouncing in his direction. Sora leaps up and blocks with his Keyblade. He jumps back as the leopard lands on the wooden floor and knocks Sora away. The leopard roars and tries to claw at him, but he slides away and strikes with his Keyblade, sending it flying across the room. After a tough struggle, it lies on the floor, tricking Sora into coming closer. Suddenly, it leaps up and roars as someone enters through a hole in the ceiling. He spins around the rafters and leaps to the floor. As the leopard pounces at Sora, the man blocks its bite with a spear. The leopard struggles wildly, its jaws clamped around the spear. The man knocks it back, glaring at it, and it snarls before leaping out a window, sending shards of glass flying everywhere. The wild man puts away his spear and addresses Sora. He has long brown dreadlocks and wears a loincloth over his toned body. He stands low, his knuckles touching the ground like an animal
cutscene.sp: ?????? Sabor, danger.
Sora Um...thank you.
?????? (slowly) Thank you.
Sora Huh? Uh, what is this place?
cutscene.desc: The man moves closer to Sora, awkwardly invading his personal space
cutscene.sp: ?????? This place, this place.
Sora Okaaay... Where did the others go?
cutscene.desc: He gets no response from the wild man
cutscene.sp: Sora Look, I got separated from my friends. Have you seen them?
cutscene.desc: The man looks confused
cutscene.sp: Sora (miming) Friends...
?????? (mimicking) Friends!
Sora Right, my friends! There’s two of ‘em. The loud one is Dona—
cutscene.desc: He stops, remembering the fight on the ship
cutscene.sp: Sora You know what? Never mind. I’m looking for my friends, Riku and Kairi.
?????? (slowly) Look for Riku, friends?
Sora (nodding) Right!
cutscene.desc: In a beam of light shining in from the rafters behind the man, Sora sees an image of Kairi
cutscene.sp: ?????? Kairi, friends?
Sora Uhh...right...
cutscene.desc: He looks at the man, then back at Kairi, who walks away
cutscene.sp: ?????? Friends here.
Sora Really!?
cutscene.desc: The man speaks something in Mangani
cutscene.sp: Sora Huh?
cutscene.desc: The man repeats
cutscene.sp: ?????? Friends here.
Sora Not sure I understand, but show me! Take me to Riku and Kairi!
?????? (pointing to himself) Tarzan. Tarzan go.
Sora (pointing to himself) And I’m...Sora. Tarzan go, Sora go go!
cutscene.desc: Tarzan opens the door and they leave the Tree House.
Meanwhile, Donald and Goofy wake up on a mound in a Bamboo Thicket
cutscene.sp: Goofy Gawrsh, where are we?
cutscene.desc: He looks to the sky
cutscene.sp: Goofy I sure hope Sora’s okay.
Donald (sitting up) Aw, who needs him? We can find the king without him.
cutscene.desc: He feels something soft on the edge of the mound while reaching for his magic wand
cutscene.sp: Donald Huh?
cutscene.desc: He looks down and comes face to face with a young gorilla. They both scream and he and Goofy hear a rustling in the jungle. As the gorilla runs away, it leaves a gummi block behind. Donald looks over and sees it shining on the ground. The rustling continues and the two swallow hard in fear as a tall man carrying a rifle enters the thicket.

Tarzan jumps from the balcony of the treehouse, crawling over the netting below, and leads Sora down the tree by sliding on its branches. They land at camp, where several tables with equipment are laid out near a group of tents. They enter an orange tent and see a woman fumbling with a projector.
cutscene.sp: Tarzan Jane!
cutscene.desc: She spins around to see him
cutscene.sp: Jane Tarzan!
cutscene.desc: She sees Sora
cutscene.sp: Jane Oh, and who is this?
Sora Uh, hi there. I’m—
cutscene.desc: She bends down to talk to him
cutscene.sp: Jane Oh, you speak English! So, then, obviously, you’re not related to Tarzan...
cutscene.desc: Tarzan and Sora exchange glances
cutscene.sp: Jane Are you here to study the gorillas?
??????? Highly doubtful.
cutscene.desc: They look over to see the tall man with the rifle enter the tent, with Donald and Goofy in tow
cutscene.sp: Goofy Sora!
cutscene.desc: Sora rushes over and locks hands with Donald
cutscene.sp: Sora Goofy! Donald!
cutscene.desc: Sora and Donald realize what they’re doing and part, crossing their arms to Goofy’s surprise. They scowl with their backs turned
cutscene.sp: ??????? A circus of clowns. Not much use for hunting gorillas.
cutscene.desc: The tall man walks back outside
cutscene.sp: Jane (frowning) Mr. Clayton, we’re studying them, not hunting them. This is research.
cutscene.desc: She sighs
cutscene.sp: Jane Well, the more the merrier. Do make yourselves at home.
Sora Well, anyway...
Donald & Sora (grouchily) I’m staying.
Sora (surprised) Huh?
Goofy Sora, look what we found. Look at this.
cutscene.desc: He holds out the red gummi block
cutscene.sp: Sora What’s that?
Goofy A gummi block. It’s the same stuff used to build our ship.
Sora So that means...
Donald The king could be here. So, we’ve gotta work together to look for him. For now.
Sora Fine. I’ll let you tag along. For now.

cutscene.desc: Sora talks to Jane
cutscene.sp: Jane Apparently Tarzan was raised in the jungle by the gorillas. Communicating with him still isn’t easy, but he’s learning.
Sora So he was speaking in gorilla back there...
Jane Ah, that’s right. You’re looking for your friends?
Sora He said Riku and Kairi are here. And one word I couldn’t understand...
Jane (showing them the projector) Why don’t we try this? We’ll show Tarzan some slides and see if any of them match that word. Oh, what happened to the slides?
cutscene.desc: Sora and company search for the slides around the campsite. They talk to Clayton during their search
cutscene.sp: Clayton Clayton’s the name. I’m a hunter, not a researcher. What? No, I am not trying to hunt the gorillas. But they’re so rare! I’d just like to get a look at them.
cutscene.desc: They return to the tent and give Jane the slides. The first shows a radiant castle, which stirs something within Sora
cutscene.sp: Goofy What’s wrong, Sora?
Sora What? Um...nothing. (thinking) This place... It just looks so familiar. But how? I’ve never been off my island.
cutscene.desc: They show the rest of the slides to Tarzan

cutscene.sp: Jane Well, Tarzan?
Sora Where are my friends, Riku and Kairi?
cutscene.desc: Tarzan shakes his head
cutscene.sp: Sora Hey, I thought—
Clayton (entering) That leaves just one place.
cutscene.desc: Sora looks up at him
cutscene.sp: Clayton Young man, we’ve been in this jungle for some time now. But we have yet to encounter these friends of yours. I’d wager they’re with the gorillas. But Tarzan refuses to take us to them.
Jane Really, Mr. Clayton. Tarzan wouldn’t hide—
Clayton Then take us there! Take us to the gorillas.
cutscene.desc: He walks up to Tarzan
cutscene.sp: Clayton (miming) Go-ril-las.
cutscene.desc: Tarzan looks over at Sora and nods
cutscene.sp: Jane Tarzan...are you sure?
Tarzan Tarzan go see Kerchak.
Jane Kerchak?
Clayton He must be the leader. Perfect. I’ll go along as an escort. After all, the jungle is a dangerous place.

cutscene.desc: He smiles and they leave the tent. Sabor attacks, but is sent scurrying back into the jungle. They enter the Hippos’ Lagoon and find more Dalmatian puppies. They find some climbable ivy and take it into a higher area of the trees. Tarzan finds Kerchak and Kala among the trees, numerous vines hanging around them. Kerchak looks sternly at Sora, Donald, and Goofy as Tarzan pleads his case to them in Mangani
cutscene.sp: Tarzan Kerchak, please listen to me. I know the nesting ground is secret, but I trust them. You see, I want to help them because...because... well, they need us.
cutscene.desc: His blue eyes show deep concern for the strangers like him. Kala looks over to Kerchak, who continues to glower. Goofy leans over to Sora and Donald
cutscene.sp: Goofy Uh... Did you get that?
Donald No.
Tarzan Kerchak.
cutscene.desc: Kerchak turns his head silently towards the treetops, sensing something. He starts to leave
cutscene.sp: Tarzan (defeated) Kerchak...
cutscene.desc: Kala looks back at Tarzan sadly and follows Kerchak. Tarzan hangs his head

cutscene.sp: Goofy (thinking) He seemed sorta distracted by something.
Donald (thinking) Was he looking toward the tree house?

cutscene.desc: Inside the tree house, the young gorilla is playing with a globe. Clayton’s rifle glints in the sunlight as the unknowing gorilla continues playing. Donald runs to the tree house and screams just as Clayton fires. His aim off, the bullet narrowly misses Terkina, who runs away behind Kerchak. Sora enters with Goofy and Tarzan
cutscene.sp: Donald What’s the big idea?
Tarzan Wait, Kerchak. Please!
cutscene.desc: Kerchak walks away, scowling. Terk follows him as Donald glares at Clayton. Tarzan turns toward Clayton, frowning
cutscene.sp: Clayton (miming nervously) You don’t understand. I was only trying to... Ah. A snake slithered by, you see. I saved that poor gorilla’s life.
cutscene.desc: Tarzan lowers his head.
The group returns to the tent and tells Jane everything
cutscene.sp: Jane (angrily) How could you do such a thing!
Clayton Now, Miss Porter, as I told you, I was not aiming at the gorilla.
Jane (angrily) You are not to go near the gorillas again!
Clayton All because of one mishap? Come, now...
cutscene.desc: Everyone glares at him and he drops his smirk. He laughs nervously and backs out of the tent. Turning away to leave, he grins cruelly. As he exits the tent, he takes out his rifle
cutscene.sp: Clayton What am I doing with these imbeciles?
cutscene.desc: He stares out into the jungle
cutscene.sp: Clayton Blasted gorillas! I’ll hunt down every last one of them! I’ll track them down somehow.
cutscene.desc: He takes out a pipe from his back pocket
cutscene.sp: Clayton I’ll stake my life on it.

cutscene.desc: He hears a rustling from the jungle and stops before the pipe reaches his mouth. He puts it away and listens for the source of the noise. He aims his rifle into the jungle as the noise gets closer, and the shot rings out loud and clear. Sora, Donald, Goofy, and Tarzan run outside and see a gorilla surrounded by monkey-like creatures
cutscene.sp: Sora Heartless!
cutscene.desc: They notice Sora and attack the group as the gorilla hides. They defeat the Heartless and the gorilla thanks them with a gummi block. Sora speaks to Jane
cutscene.sp: Jane Don’t mind Mr. Clayton. He’s not a bad person—just a bit impetuous.
cutscene.desc: They search around the jungle, protecting the rest of the gorillas from the Heartless. They return to the tent
cutscene.sp: Jane I do hope Mr. Clayton is safe...
cutscene.desc: They exit the tent and hear a gunshot from the direction of the Bamboo Thicket. They run into the thicket and find Clayton’s pipe on the mound in the center. A shadow leaps over them and Sabor lands, roaring at them, teeth bared. It claws the air towards Sora, but Donald sends a Fire spell at it. Sora strikes it with the Keyblade and it jumps into the tall stalks of bamboo. They wait for it to emerge, Tarzan listening keenly. It leaps out and Tarzan assaults it with his spear, spinning it wildly. Goofy tackles it with his shield and it tries to bite him. They continue attacking it until it slows down, its vision going blurry. Sabor looks up to the sun, falling unconscious, and collapses to the ground, losing a fang in the process.

Meanwhile, Terk runs through the campsite past numerous Heartless and into the tent, frightening Jane and knocking her to the ground. Jane looks to see that the gorilla is alright before someone enters the tent. Jane looks up, terrified, and holds Terkina tightly. Sora and company return to camp to find the tent empty
cutscene.sp: Sora Hey, where’s Jane?
Goofy What’s wrong, Tarzan?
Tarzan Something coming. Jane, danger. Jane near... Near tree house.
Donald Sounds like trouble. Let’s go.
cutscene.desc: They race to an area in the tree tops loaded with plant life. Jane and Terk are imprisoned in a web of vines
cutscene.sp: Jane Tarzan!
cutscene.desc: A large black fruit is attached to the tree trunk in the middle of the area. They take out both the Heartless and the suspicious fruit, releasing Jane and Terk from their cage. Light flows into the canopy as they talk to Jane
cutscene.sp: Jane Clayton came to the tent, and... That’s the last thing I remember.
Sora (surprised) Clayton?
Tarzan Gorillas trapped. Terk ran.
Jane We must help the gorillas!

cutscene.desc: They run to the cliff area, where the gorillas have been rounded up by Clayton and the Heartless. Clayton loads and cocks his rifle, aiming it at Kala. Kerchak roars as Heartless pounce in his direction. Clayton puts his finger on the trigger as Sora runs in
cutscene.sp: Sora No!
cutscene.desc: Clayton looks over to Sora and Kala and Kerchak walk away
cutscene.sp: Sora Clayton?
Tarzan Not Clayton!
cutscene.desc: He says something in Mangani again
cutscene.sp: Tarzan Not Clayton!
cutscene.desc: Clayton gives out a yell and the fight begins. Donald, Goofy, and Tarzan go after the Heartless, while Sora takes on Clayton. The hunter fights back, aiming his rifle at them before the cliff behind them explodes. Tarzan rushes forward, but is knocked back by an invisible creature. It calls out and Clayton mounts it, reloading his rifle and aiming it at them again. Sora attacks the creature, causing it to shed its invisibility. The great green chameleon stares at them through wild spinning eyes. It sends out beams of energy before jumping up to a high ledge, and Donald calls down a Thunder spell, while Tarzan climbs the vines along the wall towards it. He stabs it with his spear and it reels backward, knocking Clayton from its back
cutscene.sp: Clayton Lazy beast!
cutscene.desc: The Stealth Sneak Heartless fell to the ground as Clayton picks himself up. He aims at Sora, but is tackled by Goofy’s shield. Sora strikes the Heartless with a flurry of attacks while Donald casts magic spells. Tarzan faces Clayton and forces him towards the waterfall. He clutches his chest and aims his rifle at them, his eyes staring daggers. The Heartless rises up behind him slowly, sparks crackling around it, cause Clayton to turn around. It begins to fall on him and he screams. A glowing heart bursts from its chest and floats into the air as Clayton and the Heartless disappear. Kala and the other gorillas gather nearby as Kerchak walks up to Sora. He grabs him by the collar of his jacket and tosses him into the air. Sora lands with a thud on the top of the cliff. Donald and Goofy follow suit while Tarzan climbs to meet them. They look down towards the gorillas, who leave. Tarzan crawls over to the lake, where the waterfall roars
cutscene.sp: Tarzan Tarzan, home.

cutscene.desc: They enter the deepest parts of the Waterfall Cavern and find a glowing nest of butterflies in the trunk of an ancient tree. Jane and Terk join them and Tarzan repeats the Mangani word
cutscene.sp: Sora This is your home? But that means...
cutscene.desc: Tarzan stops him and places a hand to his ear
cutscene.sp: Goofy Huh?
cutscene.desc: They hear the roaring sound of water
cutscene.sp: Jane The waterfalls... They’re echoing all the way here.
cutscene.desc: Tarzan repeats the word
cutscene.sp: Tarzan Friends there. See friends.
Jane Oh, now I’ve got it. (recites Mangani word) means heart. Friends in our hearts...
Tarzan Heart...
Sora (disappointed) Oh, so that’s what it meant.
Tarzan Friends, same heart. Clayton, lose heart. No heart, no see friends. No heart, no friends.
Sora (to Donald) Sorry about what I said.
Donald I’m sorry too.
Goofy Yeah. All for one, huh?
cutscene.desc: He gathers them into a group hug, smiling. Sora walks up to the butterfly nest and they scatter around the cavern, revealing a Keyhole. Sora aims his Keyblade and seals the Keyhole. It glows with a bright light and a locking sound before a green gummi block falls to the ground, shining
cutscene.sp: Donald A gummi!
Goofy But it’s sure not the king’s.
cutscene.desc: Terk nuzzles against Donald, who looks surprised
cutscene.sp: Jane I think someone has a new admirer.
cutscene.desc: Donald starts waving his arms frantically
cutscene.sp: Donald No, no, no, no! Daisy would kill me!
cutscene.desc: Sora and Goofy laugh.
Meanwhile, the horned witch stands in a dark chapel with three other villains
cutscene.sp: ????? What drew the Heartless to that world?
?????????? The hunter lured them there. It was his lust for power that was the bait. But it seems the bait was too tasty for his own good.
cutscene.desc: A ghostly figure laughs
cutscene.sp: ????? Yeah, he got chomped instead!
cutscene.desc: A tall, thin man in pointed robes walks out of the shadows, a snake staff in his hand
cutscene.sp: ????? A weak-hearted fool like him stood no chance against the Heartless. But the boy is a problem. He found one of the Keyholes.
?????????? Fear not. It will take him ages to find the rest.
cutscene.desc: An image of Sora, Donald, and Goofy appears on the table before them
cutscene.sp: ?????????? Besides, he remains blissfully unaware of our other plan.
?????? Yes, the princesses...
?????????? They are falling into our hands, one by one. Speaking of which...
cutscene.desc: Out of the shadows steps a frightened Alice.
Back in Deep Jungle, everyone has returned to the tent
cutscene.sp: Sora Well, guess we’d better get going.
Jane Where is your ship, anyway?
Donald Well, uh... Not too far.
Tarzan Sora, Tarzan, friends
cutscene.desc: He hands him a keychain and they return to the gummi ship.

cutscene.sp: Sora The gummi block that came out of that glowing hole... It’s not like the others. Wonder what it’s used for.
Donald I dunno.
Goofy Maybe Leon’ll know.
Donald Hmm... He might. Back to Traverse Town, then?
Sora I wanna be pilot!
Donald Hey, stop it!
Sora Oh, come on! I’m the Keyblade master.
Donald I don’t care who you are! No!
Goofy Here we go again...

cutscene.desc: They travel back to Traverse Town and find Yuffie in the First District
cutscene.sp: Yuffie Leon’s probably at the underground cavern. He trains there often. You know, the channel in the alleyway is connected to the cavern.
cutscene.desc: They enter the Alleyway though the Second District and find a grate at the edge of it. They tackle the bars and enter the Secret Waterway. They swim through the channel to where Leon is practicing his battle swing. Aerith is there with him
cutscene.sp: Leon So, you found the Keyhole.
Sora Yeah. The Keyblade locked it automatically.
Aerith Good.
Leon Every world among the stars has a Keyhole. And each one leads to the heart of that world. There must be one in this town as well.
Sora What do you mean?
Aerith It was in Ansem’s report.
Leon (crossing his arms) The Heartless enter through the Keyhole and do something to the world’s core.
Sora What happens to the world?
Aerith In the end, it disappears.
Sora, Donald & Goofy What!
Leon That’s why your key is so important.
Aerith Please lock the Keyholes. You’re the only one who can.
Sora I don’t know...
Leon Seeing other worlds would probably serve you well.
Donald Yeah!
Goofy We gotta find your friends! And King Mickey!
Sora I guess you’re right... Okay!
cutscene.desc: He remembers the gummi block
cutscene.sp: Sora Hey, Leon. This gummi block’s different from the others. Do you know what it’s for?
cutscene.desc: Leon has no answer
cutscene.sp: Aerith Ask Cid. He should know.
Leon Wait, Sora. Take this with you.
cutscene.desc: He gives him a stone
cutscene.sp: Leon This stone holds some mysterious power. I’ve been carrying it for luck. I want you to hold onto it.
Sora How do you use it?
cutscene.desc: Leon crosses his arms, silently thinking
cutscene.sp: Sora Uh, Leon?

cutscene.desc: They leave the Secret Waterway and return to the First District. They enter the Accessory Shop and speak to a Moogle
cutscene.sp: Moogle A big tournament is being held somewhere, kupo.
cutscene.desc: They speak to Cid
cutscene.sp: Cid What’ve you got there? Hey! Well, if it ain’t a gummi block.
Donald Yup.
Goofy What’s this one for?
Cid You’re kiddin’ me! You’re flyin’ a gummi ship and you don’t know nothin’ about navigation gummis? Bunch of pinheads. Interspace ain’t no playground.
Sora There’s a lot we don’t know. So what! We have to use the gummi ship to go to other worlds. We don’t have a choice.
Cid Whoa, easy.
cutscene.desc: He scratches his head
cutscene.sp: Cid I didn’t know. No hard feelings, all right? Well, I guess I could lend y’all a hand, then.
Sora Thanks.
Cid Basically, with navigation gummis, you can go to new places. You want one on your ship, right?
cutscene.desc: They nod
cutscene.sp: Cid I’ll install it for you. But I got this thing I gotta go deliver first.
Sora What do you need to deliver?

Cid Just this book. It’s real old. When the guy brought it in, it was practically falling apart. Too beat up to restore it to the way it was. But overall, I did a decent job puttin’ it back together. Anyway, you mind deliverin’ it for me? It’s the old house past the Third District. Look for a big fire sign.
cutscene.desc: He hands Sora the old book before a loud bell rings
cutscene.sp: Sora Wh-What was that?
Cid Hmm? The bell at the gizmo shop is ringing. Go check it out if you want, but deliver that book for me first. When you’re done, stop by the house in the Third District. I’ll be there.
cutscene.desc: They leave the shop and enter the Third District, finding the fire sign at the end of an alley. Sora hits it with a Fire spell and the door unlocks. They enter a large cavern where a mystical house sits on a central island. Several stepping stones line the path in the water. Sora jumps on them and they begin to move rhythmically. Timing themselves, they traverse the stones and reach the house. The house looks beaten and worn down despite its festive purple hue. The front entrance way is covered in wooden boards and cloth. They find a broken hole in the side of the brick wall with a green curtain draped over it, and use it to get into the house. They enter an empty space with a raised platform in the center.
Sora hears a voice behind him and whirls around.
cutscene.sp: Kairi There’s something about this musty place...
cutscene.desc: Kairi walks slowly through the room, holding her hands behind her back
cutscene.sp: Kairi It reminds me of the secret place back home, where we used to scribble on the walls. Remember?
cutscene.desc: She looks toward him and smiles
cutscene.sp: Sora Kairi?
Goofy Sora?
cutscene.desc: He turns to see a concerned Donald and Goofy before looking back to Kairi, who has vanished completely

cutscene.sp: ?????? Well, well.
cutscene.desc: They look over to the entrance curtain and see an old wizard in blue robes with an extremely long beard. He is carrying a carpet bag and a wand
cutscene.sp: ?????? You’ve arrived sooner than I expected.
Sora Wha... You knew we were coming?
?????? Of course.
Sora Are you...a Heartless?
Donald He doesn’t look like one.
?????? Oh, my. No. My name is Merlin. As you can see, I am a sorcerer. I spend much of my time traveling. It’s good to be home. Your king has requested my help.
Goofy King Mickey?
Merlin Yes, indeed. Donald, Goofy. And who might you be, young man?
Sora I’m Sora.
Merlin Ah. So, you have found the key.
Donald What did the king ask you to do?
Merlin Just a moment...
cutscene.desc: He walks up to the stairs and sets down his carpet bag before reaching the center of the raised platform. He lifts his wand high in the air
cutscene.sp: Merlin Presto!
cutscene.desc: Dust flies around the carpet bag as it opens and out pops teapots, tables, drawers, and chairs, small at first, but quickly growing larger. The wacky wizard dances around while waving his wand, directing the items from the bag to their respective places in the house. Soon after, the room is entirely furnished, complete with bed, desk, and multiple piles of books
cutscene.sp: Merlin There, now. Ahem.
cutscene.desc: He turns to face Sora
cutscene.sp: Merlin Your king asked me to train you in the art of magic. We can start anytime you like. Let me know when you’re ready to begin the training. Oh, and one more thing.
cutscene.desc: He turns to the entrance where a small model of a royal carriage is placed on the floor next to the telescope in the open window. Magic sparkles in the air coalesce at the carriage’s place and form an elderly woman in blue robes with a pink bow around her neck. She wears her hood over her white hair and holds up a long magic wand. She smiles at them sweetly
cutscene.sp: ????? Hello. I’m the Fairy Godmother. Your king asked me to help, too. I will assist throughout your journey.
Merlin I do not know how much I can be of help, but do stop by anytime.
cutscene.desc: Sora hands him the book
cutscene.sp: Merlin Oh, that book... So, Cid asked you to bring this. Thank you. You wish to know what kind of book it is? I don’t even know, myself. In fact, it’s not mine. Somehow it found its way into my bag one day. It was such a curious book, I asked Cid to repair it for me. Well, I guess I’ll put it here somewhere, for now. This book holds a great secret. The missing pages will unlock it.
cutscene.desc: He points to a small bedside table
cutscene.sp: Merlin I’ll leave the book over there. Do look at it whenever you like. My best regards to Cid for repairing it for me. Oh, and about that stone of yours... You should ask the Fairy Godmother about that.
cutscene.desc: They speak to the Fairy Godmother and show her Leon’s stone
cutscene.sp: Sora Do you know what this is?
Fairy Godmother Oh, the poor thing! He has turned into a summon gem.
Sora A summon gem?

Fairy Godmother This little creature lived in a world that was consumed by darkness. When a world vanishes, so do its inhabitants. But this one has such a strong heart, he became a gem instead of vanishing with his world.
Sora Can he regain himself?
Fairy Godmother Yes, but only his spirit. Now, watch!
cutscene.desc: She waves her wand
cutscene.sp: Fairy Godmother Bibbidi-bobbidi-boo!
cutscene.desc: Sora is granted the power to summon Simba
cutscene.sp: Fairy Godmother Whenever you call, he will help you. If you find any more of these, bring them to me. Don’t worry, when their worlds are restored they will return there. Sora, please help save them.
Sora Don’t worry, I will.

cutscene.desc: Sora opens the old book on the nightstand and with a flash, he lands on its pages. A house of sticks appears on the map and he runs over to it, entering an empty meadow. He walks up to a large log, where a stuffed toy bear wearing a small red shirt is seated, tapping his forehead
cutscene.sp: ???? Think, think. Think, think.
Sora Hi there. What’s wrong?
???? Nothing. Just thinking.
Sora Oh.
???? I was thinking of how to say goodbye to Pooh.
Sora Pooh?
Pooh (answering) Yes?
Sora (sitting beside him) Wait a second. You’re Pooh?
Pooh Yes, I’m Winnie the Pooh. Pooh for short. Who are you?
Sora I’m Sora.
Pooh Oh. Hello, Sora. Have you come to say goodbye to Pooh, too?
cutscene.desc: His face turns sad
cutscene.sp: Sora Well, no. Why would I do that? We’ve only just met.
Pooh Because everyone’s gone away.
Sora What do you mean?

Pooh Well, we all lived here in the Hundred Acre Wood. And we’d take walks together, or play Pooh sticks... And every day, I’d eat some honey. Just one small smackeral would taste very good right now.
cutscene.desc: He rubs his tummy
cutscene.sp: Pooh But now everyone’s gone. All my friends, and my favorite Hunny Tree too. Everyone must’ve gone away while I was napping, I think... So, who knows?
cutscene.desc: He hops off the log
cutscene.sp: Pooh Maybe I shall end up going away somewhere as well. But I wonder, how do I say goodbye to myself?
cutscene.desc: He puts his hands on his head
cutscene.sp: Pooh Think, think, think.
cutscene.desc: Sora stares at him
cutscene.sp: Pooh Oh, my tumbly is getting rather rumbly.

cutscene.desc: Sora watches him walk off. He follows the bear to a house built into a tree. Above the door of the house is hung an odd sign reading MR. SANDERZ with a backwards N. Next to it is a bell with a misspelled note reading Rnig also. Sora enters the house, seeing Pooh gazing inside a honey pot
cutscene.sp: Pooh Oh, bother. There’s no more honey left. If only the Hunny Tree would visit... Then I could eat my fill.

cutscene.desc: He stands up and leaves the house. Sora follows, being greeted outside by an owl
cutscene.sp: Owl Let me guess: You’d like to know what happens next. Unfortunately, some of the pages are missing, so I can’t tell you yet. The pages are scattered over many worlds. Would you find them for us?

cutscene.desc: Sora exits the storybook and regroups with Donald and Goofy in Merlin’s Study
cutscene.sp: Merlin You’d best go see Cid before going anywhere else.
cutscene.desc: They leave the Mystical House and return to the Third District.
Soldier Heartless appear, but they are taken out by someone with a sharp-looking sword. Sora looks incredibly surprised to see...
cutscene.sp: Riku There you are. What’s going on?
Sora Riku!
cutscene.desc: He walks up to Riku and stretches his mouth out, making sure he’s real
cutscene.sp: Riku Hey, hey, cut it out.
Sora I’m not dreaming this time, right?
Riku I hope not. Took forever to find you.
cutscene.desc: He runs a hand through his finger as Sora smiles
cutscene.sp: Sora Riku!
cutscene.desc: Riku smiles back and they start walking through the square
cutscene.sp: Sora Wait a second, where’s Kairi?
Riku Isn’t she with you?
cutscene.desc: Sora looks down, sadly
cutscene.sp: Riku Well, don’t worry. I’m sure she made it off the island, too.
cutscene.desc: He looks to the sky
cutscene.sp: Riku We’re finally free. Hey, she might even be looking for us now.
cutscene.desc: A Shadow Heartless emerges from the ground, its antennae wriggling wildly. Riku is faced away from everyone
cutscene.sp: Riku We’ll all be together again soon. Don’t worry. Just leave everything to me. I know this—
cutscene.desc: He hears a noise behind him, and turns to see Sora, who has just destroyed the Shadow Heartless. Sora stands and tosses the Keyblade over his shoulder
cutscene.sp: Sora (proudly) Leave it to who?
Riku (walking closer) Sora, what did you—
Sora I’ve been looking for you and Kairi, too, with their help.
cutscene.desc: Donald and Goofy nod, but Riku looks apprehensive
cutscene.sp: Riku Who are they?
Donald Ahem. My name is—
Sora We’ve visited so many places and worlds, looking for you.
Riku Really? Well, what do you know? I never would have guessed.
cutscene.desc: Goofy puts his hands on Sora’s shoulders
cutscene.sp: Goofy Oh, and guess what? Sora’s the Keyblade master.
Donald Who would’ve thought it?
Sora (stomping his foot) What’s that mean?
Riku So, this is called a Keyblade?
cutscene.desc: Riku holds up Sora’s Keyblade
cutscene.sp: Sora Huh?
cutscene.desc: He looks at his own hand in confusion
cutscene.sp: Sora Hey, give it back.
cutscene.desc: He rushes forward to grab it, but Riku moves back and Sora stumbles and falls over. Riku holds the Keyblade above his head, getting a good look at it
cutscene.sp: Riku Catch!
Sora Whoa!
cutscene.desc: He tosses it to Sora, who stands up quickly
cutscene.sp: Sora Okay, so you’re coming with us, right? We’ve got this awesome rocket. Wait ‘til you see it!
Donald (rudely) No, he can’t come!
Sora (stomping his foot again) What?
Donald Forget it!
Sora Oh, come on! He’s my friend!
Donald I don’t care!
cutscene.desc: The argument catches Goofy’s attention, but when he looks back at Riku, he sees no one
cutscene.sp: Goofy Huh? He’s gone.
cutscene.desc: Sora looks around the District, seeing nobody
cutscene.sp: Sora Riku?
cutscene.desc: He walks slowly
cutscene.sp: Sora Nice going. Oh, well. At least, he’s okay.
cutscene.desc: He puts his hands behind his head, hopeful
cutscene.sp: Sora And who knows? Maybe we’ll run into Kairi soon, too.

cutscene.desc: They walk up the stairs to the Small House, seeing the lights on in the window and enter to find Cid, Leon, Yuffie, and Aerith inside. Boxes are stacked up against the wall and a lantern hangs from the ceiling
cutscene.sp: Cid You guys ever hear of Maleficent?

cutscene.desc: Sora shakes his head as Leon leans against the wall
cutscene.sp: Cid I hear she’s in town.
Sora Who is she?
Cid A witch, man, she’s a witch!
Leon She’s the reason this town is full of Heartless. Don’t take her lightly.
Aerith She’s been using the Heartless for years.
Leon We lost our world, thanks to her.
Cid One day, a swarm of Heartless took over our world!
Leon That was nine years ago.
Cid I got out of that mess and came here with these guys.
Donald That’s awful!
Leon Our ruler was a wise man named Ansem. He dedicated his life to studying the Heartless.
Cid His report should tell us how to get rid of the Heartless.
Sora Where’s this report?
Leon We don’t know. It got scattered when our world was destroyed.
Cid I’m sure Maleficent’s got most of the pages.

cutscene.desc: Outside, Maleficent stands with Riku, gazing at them through the windows of the house
cutscene.sp: Maleficent You see? It’s just as I told you. While you toiled away trying to find your dear friend, he quite simply replaced you with some new companions. Evidently, now he values them far more than he does you.

cutscene.desc: She looks down at Riku as he stares with narrow, unblinking eyes
cutscene.sp: Maleficent You’re better off without that wretched boy.

cutscene.desc: She bends down to his level, giving him a smile
cutscene.sp: Maleficent Now, think no more of him and come with me. I’ll help you find what you’re searching for...

cutscene.desc: In the Small House, they carry on their conversation
cutscene.sp: Cid So, you delivered that book? That navigation gummi’s installed and ready to go. You find another one, you bring it to me. I threw in a warp gummi for the heck of it. Now you can jump to worlds you’ve been to before. Well, better get back to my real job. What’s my real job? You’ll see. See me at the First District.
Aerith I’ve been thinking about the bell in the Second District.
Sora That one that rang a bit ago?
Yuffie The one above the gizmo shop. There’s a legend about it, you know.
Aerith But it’s all boarded up. Nobody can get in there.
Cid Heck, go check it out. Ring it three times to see if anything happens.

cutscene.desc: They leave and enter the Second District, battling Heartless on their way to the roof of the Gizmo Shop. They take down the wooden boards of the bell tower and Sora rings the bell

The mural in the fountain in the square below changes and the empty fountain fills with flames. Sora rings it again and the mural changes once more, the fire dissipating and the lights above the fountain blink on. When the bell tolls the third time, the lights shut off and water spurts out of the fountain, the mural changing finally to butterflies surrounding a flower, which then reveals a large Keyhole. They jump down to the square and approach the fountain when the Guard Armor drops from the sky. Sora begins attacking the torso of the Heartless while Donald and Goofy go after its legs. It spins its arms wildly and with a few more hits, it crashes to the ground, motionless. The trio pauses, watching as the armor twitches. It reforms its body and falls forward, its arms digging into the ground. Its torso and legs flip over, and the toes of its hammer- like feet curve inwards, forming hands. Its helmet opens and its yellow eyes stare blankly at them. It lunges forward and meets the blade in Sora’s hands. The Opposite Armor continues to tackle them, floating in midair. The Heartless soon splits itself in half, the helmet and arms going after Sora, and the feet and torso find their targets in Donald and Goofy. Donald summons a Thunder spell, sending bolts of electricity into the armor. The helmet swirls around between the arms, almost taunting them, before its body reforms. It moves to tackle them again, but mid-tackle, Sora strikes, knocking its parts everywhere. Nearly defenseless, they destroy its appendages, leaving just the torso and helmet. It turns its torso sideways, staring at them with its glowing eyes. A ball of energy shoots out from inside it, and it targets Sora, who dodges away. Another ball of energy shoots out, and this time Sora is ready for it. He blocks with his Keyblade, sending the orb back to the Opposite Armor, which begins to shake violently. The helmet falls inside its torso and a large glowing heart floats out into the sky, before the armor disappears. Sora walks over to the shining Keyhole, and locks it. The Keyhole shimmers and breaks off, disintegrating into pieces, leaving only the butterfly mural and a gummi block. Sora, Donald, and Goofy return to the First District and meet Cid behind the Accessory Shop
cutscene.sp: Cid Hey, now that was quick! Now you know. I’m in the gummi block business. Workin’ on your gummi ship sure was great. Come again and I’ll give you a big discount.

cutscene.desc: He gives them a gummi block
cutscene.sp: Cid Go ahead, take it. It’s a special giveaway.

cutscene.desc: They show him the gummi block they found at the Keyhole
cutscene.sp: Cid Hey, got another navigation gummi there, eh? I’ll bet you want it installed.
Sora Yeah, please.
Cid Hmm... Looks like this is another one of those blocks that come in sets. You gotta find the mate to this one.

cutscene.desc: He returns the gummi block to them and they enter the Accessory Shop, seeing a small boy on the floor near the counter. Jiminy Cricket jumps onto Sora’s shoulder
cutscene.sp: Jiminy Well, well, as I live and breathe! If it isn’t Pinocchio!

cutscene.desc: The cricket hops down to the boy and Sora is surprised to see that he is entirely made of wood
cutscene.sp: Pinocchio (looking up) Oh. Hi, Jiminy.
Jiminy What in the world are you doing down here?
Pinocchio (thinking) Um... Playing hide-and-seek.

cutscene.desc: Jiminy starts pacing around
cutscene.sp: Jiminy I just don’t believe it. And here I was, up all night, just worried sick about you. Why of all the—

cutscene.desc: He looks up at Pinocchio, shocked
cutscene.sp: Jiminy Pinocchio!

cutscene.desc: Pinocchio stares at his nose, which has magically grown longer
cutscene.sp: Jiminy (sternly) Pinocchio! Are you telling me the truth?
Pinocchio Yes!
Jiminy Then tell me, what is this?

cutscene.desc: He points to an item on the floor beside them
cutscene.sp: Pinocchio It was a present.
Jiminy No fibbing, now! You know you’re not supposed to tell lies. A lie only grows and grows, ‘til you get caught! Plain as the nose on your face!
Pinocchio But if you want something, why wait? Why not just take it?
Jiminy Oh, my! Who told you that? You need some advice from your conscience!
Pinocchio That’s right! You’re my conscience, Jiminy! I’ll never tell lies as long as you’re around.

cutscene.desc: Magic surrounds Pinocchio’s nose and it shrinks to its normal size
cutscene.sp: Jiminy You need to be good so you can become a real boy. You promised Geppetto you would be, right?
Pinocchio Oh! Do you know where Father is?
Jiminy He’s not with you?
Pinocchio Jiminy, let’s go find Father!
Jiminy Now, hold on! There are all sorts of dangers and temptations out there! I’ll go find Geppetto, so you just wait here. These fellows here will be helping me.
Sora We will?

cutscene.desc: Pinocchio stands up
cutscene.sp: Jiminy Well, shall we go, Sora?
Sora You could’ve asked us first...

cutscene.desc: They leave Traverse Town and travel to Olympus Coliseum, where they compete in the Phil Cup. After making their way up the tournament, they speak to Phil and Hercules
cutscene.sp: Philoctetes I never thought you’d do it. Not bad.
Hercules Phil, you’re just as stubborn as ever. Don’t pretend you’re not happy for them!
Philoctetes Ahem! Now, kid, you’ve still got a long way to go. The next round’s startin’ soon. Next time it’ll be the real thing.

cutscene.desc: They leave for the world of Agrabah, where a tall, thin man in robes walks through the streets with Maleficent
cutscene.sp: Maleficent And the Keyhole?
????? The Heartless are searching for it now. I’m certain we’ll find it soon enough. So that just leaves...

cutscene.desc: Overhead, a brightly-colored parrot squawks through the air loudly before circling down to land on the man’s pointed shoulders
cutscene.sp: Iago Jafar! I’ve looked everywhere for Jasmine. She’s disappeared like magic!
Jafar The girl is more trouble than she’s worth.
Maleficent You said you had things under control.
Jafar Agrabah is full of holes for rats to hide in. But why worry about Princess Jasmine? With her or without her, surely this world will be ours when we find the Keyhole.
Maleficent We need all seven princesses of heart to open the final door. Any fewer is useless.
Jafar Well, if the princess is that important, we’ll find her.

cutscene.desc: Bandit Heartless appear behind him, brandishing swords
cutscene.sp: Jafar Find Jasmine and bring her to me at once.

cutscene.desc: The Heartless follow Iago through the streets
cutscene.sp: Maleficent Don’t steep yourself in darkness too long. The Heartless consume the careless.

cutscene.desc: Jafar laughs proudly
cutscene.sp: Jafar Your concern is touching, but hardly necessary.

cutscene.desc: Behind Maleficent in a watermelon stand, a worried young woman overhears their conversation. She is no commoner, as her jewelry and her clothes are obviously expensive. Sora, Donald, and Goofy arrive in the Plaza to find Heartless roaming the streets of Agrabah. They take out the Heartless as they make their way into an Alley. Sora gasps, when he sees someone staring at them from behind a pile of crates
cutscene.sp: ??????? Who’s there? Hello?

cutscene.desc: The girl comes out of hiding and speaks to them
cutscene.sp: ??????? I’m Jasmine. My father is the sultan of Agrabah.
Goofy Uh... So that makes you a princess.
Jasmine But he has been deposed by Jafar, who now controls the city.
Goofy Jafar?

Jasmine You haven’t heard of him? He’s the royal vizier. He’s gained evil powers and seized Agrabah. He’s desperately looking for something— something he calls the Keyhole. Jafar caught me trying to escape, but he helped me.
Sora Who helped you?
Jasmine We were hiding nearby, but he left a while ago to take care of something... Oh, I hope Aladdin’s all right.
Jafar Aladdin? Where might I find this street rat?

cutscene.desc: They look up to see Jafar on a high ledge
cutscene.sp: Jafar Jasmine, allow me to find you more suitable company, my dear princess. These little rats won’t do, you see.
Sora Jasmine, run!

cutscene.desc: Jasmine runs into the city and the three reveal their weapons
cutscene.sp: Jafar Ah, the boy who holds the key.

cutscene.desc: Jafar summons Heartless, who drop down and attack them as Jafar escapes. They defeat the Heartless and walk through Main Street, finding an entrance to a loft. Inside the loft, they find an ornate rug trying to pull itself out from under a chest of drawers. They move it off of the rug, who stands in front of them on two tassels and bows in gratitude, before magically flying out the open hole in the wall
cutscene.sp: Donald The carpet flew off toward the desert. Let’s follow it, Sora!

cutscene.desc: They make their way to the vast desert, sand and sky as far as the eye can see. The magic carpet flies towards them and lands. It motions for them to come along, and they ride it to a sandpit, where a young man and his pet monkey are trapped in the sand. A horde of Heartless appears and they are forced to fight them before reaching the young man. More Heartless surround them
cutscene.sp: Goofy Gawrsh, not again!

cutscene.desc: The man manages to get himself free, pulling out a rather old and dirty oil lamp
cutscene.sp: Aladdin Genie, get rid of these guys!

cutscene.desc: He rubs the lamp and holds it into the air. Magic sparks appear from the lamp followed by blue smoke, and a large genie erupts from it with a yell
cutscene.sp: Genie Wish Number One, coming right up!

cutscene.desc: He snaps his fingers and the Heartless vanish around them. Later, they stand in the desert as the magic carpet flies overhead
cutscene.sp: Aladdin I see... Thanks, Sora.
Sora Aladdin, what’re you doing out here?
Aladdin Same old stuff. Hunting legendary treasure. Just paid a visit to the Cave of Wonders.

cutscene.desc: The carpet lands
cutscene.sp: Aladdin I found that magic carpet, and this lamp.

cutscene.desc: He shows them the lamp
cutscene.sp: Aladdin Legend has it that whoever holds the lamp can summon the—
Genie Please, kid, leave the intros to a professional. (winking) The one and only GENIE OF THE LAMP!

cutscene.desc: He rubs the lamp
cutscene.sp: Genie Rub-a-dub-dub the lamp and have your dearest wishes granted.

cutscene.desc: He bows and flies over to Aladdin
cutscene.sp: Genie Today’s winner is...Aladdin! Congratulations!

cutscene.desc: Genie makes confetti rain down on him and shakes his hand
cutscene.sp: Donald Any wish?
Genie Patience, my fine feathered friend.

cutscene.desc: He splits into three genies, each holding up three fingers
cutscene.sp: Genie Any three wishes ! A one wish (one genie disappears), a two wish (two disappear), a three wish. Then I make like a banana and split!

cutscene.desc: The third disappears
cutscene.sp: Genie Our lucky winner made his first wish—

cutscene.desc: He reappears next to Sora
cutscene.sp: Genie (aside) And let me tell you, what a doozy that wish was—

cutscene.desc: He split into two back-to-back genies
cutscene.sp: Genie (echoing) So he has two left.

cutscene.desc: He pops out and zooms back in, turning his smoky tail into a microphone
cutscene.sp: Genie So, master, what’ll you have for Wish Number Two?

cutscene.desc: He spins and drops a spotlight on Aladdin, who puts a hand on his chin
cutscene.sp: Aladdin Hmm, how about making me a fabulously wealthy prince?
Genie Oooh! Money! Royalty! Fame!

cutscene.desc: He pinches the air and bows
cutscene.sp: Genie Okay, you asked for it! A hundred servants and a hundred camels loaded with gold!

cutscene.desc: He starts dialing on an imaginary phone, holding his hand up to his ear
cutscene.sp: Genie Just say the word and I’ll deliver it in 30 minutes or less, or your meal’s free.

cutscene.desc: He flies over to Aladdin, putting an arm around his shoulder
cutscene.sp: Genie Hey, I’ll even throw in a cappuccino!
Aladdin (chuckling) No, thanks!
Genie Okay.
Aladdin I think I’ll put that on hold until we reach Agrabah.
Goofy Uh, why a prince?
Aladdin You see, there’s this girl in Agrabah named Jasmine. But she’s a princess, and I’m... Aww, she could never fall for a guy like me.

cutscene.desc: He looks toward the sand
cutscene.sp: Donald Oh. Princess?
Goofy Jasmine?
Sora Oh, that’s right! She’s in trouble, Aladdin!
Aladdin What? Well, c’mon, let’s get going!

cutscene.desc: They board the magic carpet, and start flying back to Agrabah. Genie flies alongside them
cutscene.sp: Genie Ah, fresh air! The great outdoors!
Sora I guess you don’t get out much, huh?
Genie Comes with the job. Phenomenal cosmic powers. Itty-bitty living space. It’s always three wishes, then back to my portable prison. I’m lucky to see the light of day every century or two...
Aladdin Say, Genie, what if I use my last wish to free you from the lamp? What do you think?
Genie (smiling) You’d do that?
Aladdin Genie, it’s a promise. After we help Jasmine.

cutscene.desc: They fly to the city and enter Aladdin’s House
cutscene.sp: Aladdin So, Jafar is after Jasmine and this Keyhole.
Genie Keyhole, eh? I could swear I’ve heard about that somewhere before...
Donald Really? Where?
Genie Now, where was it? It’s only been 200 years...
Sora Well, anyway, we’ve got to stop Jafar before it’s too late.

cutscene.desc: They enter the Palace Gates by way of a high ledge and see Jafar standing at the gates with Princess Jasmine. They jump down to their level, alerting the vizier to their presence
cutscene.sp: Jafar Setting your sights a little high, aren’t you boy? Back to your hole, street rat. I will not allow you to trouble the princess any more.
Aladdin (shouting) Jasmine!
Jasmine I’m so sorry, Aladdin.

cutscene.desc: Jafar holds out an arm to block her, while Aladdin pulls out the lamp behind his back
cutscene.sp: Aladdin (rubbing the lamp) Genie, help Jasmine, please!

cutscene.desc: Jafar turns and his eyes grow wide, seeing Genie carrying Jasmine
cutscene.sp: Genie (cheerfully) One wish left! You’re making this really easy, you know.
Jafar (smirking) So sorry, boy. I’m afraid your second wish has been denied.

cutscene.desc: Iago flies over to Jafar with the lamp. Aladdin looks at his hand, seeing it empty, and knocks the cap off his head in shock. Iago gives Jafar the lamp
cutscene.sp: Genie I’m sorry, Al.

cutscene.desc: He disappears and Jasmine falls through the air with a scream, landing in a clay pot which suddenly grows legs
cutscene.sp: Jafar And now, I bid you all farewell. Attack!

cutscene.desc: Jafar disappears as two pots explode behind them, revealing the front and back of a Heartless. Sora attacks the front head, and its antennae light up with a burst of electricity. It swings them around wildly, striking Sora in the face. He reels back as Aladdin searches around for Jasmine, who is desperately calling out for help among the clay pots. Several of the numerous pots have grown legs and are walking around the area towards the large Heartless. Sora watches as the Pot Spiders join with the head and tail, becoming a Pot Centipede, which begins to walk toward the desert, gathering more Pot Spiders and growing bigger. Jasmine’s cries become fainter and they run after the Pot Centipede, searching for the princess within its body. As it races away from them, its tail bursts with darkness
cutscene.sp: Sora Courage!

cutscene.desc: He holds a hand to his heart, summoning with all his might. He gathers energy on the end of his Keyblade and thrusts it into the air, magic swirling around him. Up from the ground comes a large figure with glowing eyes. It steps forward and its golden fur and large mane come into view. The lion gives off a mighty roar, which fills the air. Simba jumps toward the Pot Centipede and bellows, sending various Pot Spiders shattering. When one pot is left, the Centipede gathers it up and starts to run faster. Aladdin races after it and with Sora’s help, the Pot Centipede is defeated. Aladdin runs at it, but it disappears, leaving nothing
cutscene.sp: Aladdin Jasmine!

cutscene.desc: They hear an evil laugh emanating from the desert
cutscene.sp: Aladdin To the desert! Come on, let’s move!

cutscene.desc: They take the Magic Carpet to the Desert. Suddenly, something bursts out of the sand, spinning violently toward them. It lands two giant feet on the ground, clawing at carpet, who dodges frantically as Sora grits his teeth. The four of them topple out of the carpet as Kurt Zisa turns its six-armed body in their direction, summoning two orbs of energy in its hands. The orb cancel their magic summoning abilities and Sora moves in to attack its feet. As it walks closer to them, the mechanical crunch echoing through the desert, it stares at them with its snake-like head. Two of its other arms hold long curved scythes, which is spins wildly, slicing at them. Sora and Aladdin eliminate the magic-cancelling orbs and Donald sends a Thunder spell, sending it falling to the ground. It’s head rears up out of its body on a long elastic neck, attempting to bite them, before it jumps back up, summoning large dust devils, tossing sand everywhere. Goofy charges it with his shield, but misses as it spins through the air toward Sora. Donald heals him as it sends fireballs toward them. With several more critical strikes, Kurt Zisa stumbles forward. They run away from it as its arms crash down in the sand around them. Aladdin summons the Magic Carpet and it swoops down to grab them as the Heartless falls over completely. A large glowing heart rises up into the sky as they fly away towards the end of the desert, watching as the Heartless vanishes in the distance. They reach the sandpit where they found Aladdin earlier and dismount from the carpet. They step forward and the sand in front of them lurches upward. The ground quakes as an enormous tiger head heaves out of the sand. Its mouth opens, heat and flame emanating from its depths, and its eyes glow. An evil glow, one of dark purpose. They approach its mouth before it reels upward, blasting them with a hot torrent of sand. Heartless appear and they realize the tiger head is under their control. Sora begins thrashing at the Heartless before a beam of energy strikes Aladdin in the back, knocking him over. Donald heals him and Sora sees that the beams are coming from its eyes. After he destroys a few Heartless, the tiger head buries its mouth in the sand, and Sora jumps onto its nose, because it releases a spray of sand from its mouth. Sora attacks its eyes before a Bandit Heartless flips onto the top of the tiger, almost knocking Sora off. Goofy climbs up the side of the tiger head and shields Sora from more flying Heartless. Sora continues striking the eyes until the power of darkness is driven from the Cave of Wonders. Once everything settles down, they enter the cave. Fighting Heartless through the labyrinthine halls of the Cave of Wonders, they drop down to a watery level and Sora destroys a pillar with a Fire spell. Meanwhile, in the Lamp Chamber, Jafar stands next to an enslaved Genie as Jasmine lies unconscious on the stone floor. Jafar taps his snake staff on the ground and holds up the magic lamp
cutscene.sp: Jafar My first wish, Genie! Show me the Keyhole!

cutscene.desc: Genie looks over, despondently, and snaps his fingers. The rock wall bursts open, revealing pillars and a Keyhole beyond. Jafar cackles evilly. Sora, Donald, Goofy, and Aladdin make their way past the Treasure Room and into the Lamp Chamber, where they find Jafar speaking with Maleficent
cutscene.sp: Maleficent That boy again?
Jafar He’s more persistent than I expected. Why not explain the situation to that boy Riku? Doing so may actually prove useful to our--

cutscene.desc: He is distracted by footsteps, and turns to see Sora and company arrive
cutscene.sp: Sora Wait a second. Are you Maleficent?

cutscene.desc: The witch vanishes without a word
cutscene.sp: Aladdin Jafar, let Jasmine go!
Jafar Not a chance.

cutscene.desc: She lies at his feet in front of the Keyhole
cutscene.sp: Jafar You see, she’s a princess—one of seven who somehow hold the key to opening the door.
Goofy Open...
Donald ...the door?
Jafar But you fools won’t live to see what lies beyond it. Genie! My second wish. Crush them!

cutscene.desc: Aladdin gasps as Genie hangs in the air
cutscene.sp: Aladdin Genie, no!
Genie Sorry, Al. The one with the lamp calls the shots. I don’t have a choice.

cutscene.desc: Jafar lifts his snake staff into the air, and its eyes glow, creating a magic barrier around the room, blocking the exit and the Keyhole. Jafar begins chanting a spell and he sends a beam of heat from his staff at them. Aladdin runs forward and attacks Jafar, who teleports to a platform on the other edge of the room as Genie floats toward them
cutscene.sp: Genie I’m really sorry about this. Run!

cutscene.desc: He swipes at them, but they dodge his attacks and follow Jafar. Sora catches up and begins thrashing with his Keyblade, causing Genie to cheer. Jafar chants another spell, causing a giant hailstorm in the center of the room, trapping Donald and Goofy. Aladdin strikes from behind while Jafar is distracted and the vizier pulses with energy. Lightning crackles around him and he screams. Aladdin runs over to Jasmine, but before he can reach her, Jafar gets an idea
cutscene.sp: Jafar Genie!

cutscene.desc: They turn to see Jafar floating in the center of the room, holding up the magic lamp
cutscene.sp: Jafar My final wish! I want you to make me and all-powerful genie!

cutscene.desc: Genie covers his eyes and looks away, pointing his finger at Jafar and releasing as small amount of wish energy as possible. It strikes Jafar, who begins to glow and the floor crumbles beneath him, revealing a large pool of lava surrounding stone platforms. Jafar descends towards the pool and they stare down into the frightening, gaping maw. They jump down into the cavern, searching around for Jafar, when suddenly he bursts out of the lava with a great laugh. He gazes down at them evilly in his red genie form, brimming with power and malice. Iago flies by them, holding a coal black lamp
cutscene.sp: Aladdin The lamp! Get Jafar’s lamp!
Jafar Iago! Keep the lamp away from them!
Iago Yeah, yeah, I hear you!

cutscene.desc: Jafar begins throwing molten rocks at them as they go after Iago
cutscene.sp: Iago Nag, nag! It’s all he ever does!

cutscene.desc: The air is dense with heat, making it hard to breathe. They corner Iago on a faraway platform as Jafar rises up to meet them. Sora sends a Blizzara spell at him, but he shrugs it off
cutscene.sp: Iago Ugh! Is it hot in here, or is it just me?

cutscene.desc: After attacking Iago for a while, the bird lands
cutscene.sp: Iago Water! Water!
Jafar Keep moving!

cutscene.desc: Jafar heals Iago
cutscene.sp: Iago I don’t need your help, all right!

cutscene.desc: Iago takes back the lamp and continues flying around with it. The platforms rise higher, allowing them to knock the lamp away from the bird. It drops to the ground and Sora grabs it
cutscene.sp: Sora Okay, Jafar! Back to your lamp!

cutscene.desc: He holds it up and Jafar screams as magic whips around him, pulling him into the magic lamp. Jasmine watches from above, before hearing footsteps behind her. She turns around slowly and is taken. The magic carpet brings Sora, Donald, Goofy, and Aladdin back to the Keyhole, but Jasmine is nowhere to be found
cutscene.sp: Aladdin Jasmine? Jasmine!

cutscene.desc: The Keyhole glows in the presence of the Keyblade and Sora seals it. Magic swirls around the Keyhole and a curtain of gold sparkles covers it with a loud locking sound. The cave begins to rumble and Goofy covers his head with his shield
cutscene.sp: Goofy Whoa, we’d better get out of here!
Aladdin Jasmine!

cutscene.desc: They pull Aladdin onto the magic carpet and it speeds them out of the Cave of Wonders. They fly back to Aladdin’s House
cutscene.sp: Aladdin So, Jasmine’s no longer in Agrabah. Sora, let’s go find her.
Sora (sadly) Sorry. I can’t take you with me.
Aladdin Wh-Why not?

cutscene.desc: Aladdin sits down
cutscene.sp: Goofy I sure wish we could...
Donald But we can’t. If we take him to another world, we would be...
Goofy Muh... Mudd—
Donald Meddling!
Sora Aladdin, we’ll find Jasmine. I promise.
Genie (patting Aladdin’s back) Uh, earth to Al. Hello? You still have one wish left. Look, just say the word. Ask me to find Jasmine for you.
Aladdin I...I wish...

cutscene.desc: Genie rolls up his imaginary sleeves
cutscene.sp: Aladdin For your freedom, Genie.
Genie (surprised) Al!

cutscene.desc: Magic swirls around Genie, who’s smoky tail splits into two legs, and the golden cuffs on his wrists disappear
cutscene.sp: Aladdin A deal’s a deal, Genie. Now you can go anywhere you want. You’re your own master. But if you can, it’d be great if you could go along with them and help Sora find Jasmine.

cutscene.desc: Genie turns away, crossing his arms
cutscene.sp: Genie Sorry, Al. I’m done taking orders from others. But... A favor, now that’s entirely different.

cutscene.desc: He looks back at him, smiling brightly
cutscene.sp: Genie I guess I could give that a try.

cutscene.desc: He leaps over, putting a hand on Aladdin’s shoulder
cutscene.sp: Genie After all, we’re pals, right, Al?
Aladdin Genie...
Genie (smiling) Just leave it to me!

cutscene.desc: Aladdin runs a hand through his hair and chuckles. Meanwhile, in a dark chapel, Maleficent and Hades stand around a table. Hades sighs as Maleficent faces away from them
cutscene.sp: Hades That smarmy vizier could’ve had ‘em—if someone had stuck around to give him a hand.

cutscene.desc: He looks over at Riku, who glances back at him with narrowed eyes
cutscene.sp: Riku Hey, I did my part. I brought the princess, didn’t I?
Maleficent Jafar was beyond help, consumed by his own hatred. One should beware of letting it burn too fiercely.
Hades Whoa, whoa, whoa. Lighten up. I’m as cool as they come, okay? By the way, kid, have we got something special for you.
Riku Huh?

cutscene.desc: Riku looks toward Maleficent
cutscene.sp: Maleficent We had a deal, yes? You help us, and we grant you your wish...

cutscene.desc: An image of Kairi appears on the table
cutscene.sp: Riku Kairi!
Maleficent Go to her. Your vessel is waiting.

cutscene.desc: A man walks in wearing pirate’s robes and a large feathered cap. He holds up a hook for a hand, smirking
cutscene.sp: ???? Just remember, this is no pleasure cruise. It won’t be a pleasant voyage.
Riku (to Maleficent) Why are you doing all this for me? What’s the catch?
Maleficent (turning to face him) Catch? What’s the catch?

cutscene.desc: She bends down to him, placing a hand on his cheek
cutscene.sp: Maleficent Silly, boy. You’re like a son to me. I only want you to be happy.

cutscene.desc: He knocks her hand away
cutscene.sp: Riku I seriously doubt that.
Maleficent Believe what you wish. But lest we forget, I kept my end of the bargain.

cutscene.desc: He stares at her before walking towards the pirate. Back in Agrabah, Sora speaks to Aladdin
cutscene.sp: Aladdin Here. Take this with you.

cutscene.desc: He gives Sora a keychain
cutscene.sp: Aladdin Sora, please find Jasmine for me.

cutscene.desc: They return to the gummi ship
cutscene.sp: Sora Could this torn page be from Merlin’s book?
Goofy Let’s return to town and give it to him.

cutscene.desc: They return to Merlin’s Study and Sora enters the 100 Acre Wood. He finds a tall, curious tree buzzing with bees
cutscene.sp: ?????? Hello, i-is anyone there?

cutscene.desc: From inside a log nearby, a small piglet walks out, looking around nervously
cutscene.sp: ?????? Wh-Wh-What am I to do? I’m all alone. (calling) Pooh? Pooh? Where are you? It’s me, Piglet.

cutscene.desc: He turns around and a shadow creeps over him. He looks up to see Sora towering over him and runs away behind the tree. He peeks out from its trunk, checking to see if Sora is gone. Sora sneaks up behind him and he stands frozen in place, completely terrified
cutscene.sp: Piglet Oh dear! I was j-just... N-Never mind. I’m sorry!

cutscene.desc: Piglet closes his eyes and Sora kneels down to his level
cutscene.sp: Sora Don’t be scared. You’re looking for Pooh, right?
Piglet You know Pooh?

cutscene.desc: He sighs with relief
cutscene.sp: Piglet Oh, y-you see, I-I have something for him. I have to take it to Pooh right away!

cutscene.desc: He turns, seeing Winnie the Pooh walking towards the tree
cutscene.sp: Piglet (calling) Oh, Pooh!

cutscene.desc: He runs to meet the bear, who begins sniffing the air, smiling
cutscene.sp: Pooh Oh, I believe I smell a delicious something—a something like honey!
Piglet Pooh!

cutscene.desc: Piglet meets him in front of the tree
cutscene.sp: Pooh Hello, Piglet. How have you been?
Piglet Oh, I-I’m so glad to see you. I thought you’d gone away. I brought wh-what you asked for.

cutscene.desc: He gives Pooh a blue balloon
cutscene.sp: Pooh Thank you, Piglet. Now I can finally have some honey.
Piglet Really? B-But how?
Pooh I shall hold on to the balloon, and fly like a bee up the Hunny Tree, see.
Piglet But if you take their honey, won’t the bees be angry?
Pooh Hmm...

cutscene.desc: He stares at the balloon, thinking
cutscene.sp: Pooh Oh!

cutscene.desc: Sora walks over to them
cutscene.sp: Pooh If you could only chase away those bees, I’m quite certain I could get a small morsel of honey. Would you help me get some honey?
Sora Sure!

cutscene.desc: Owl lands on a branch above them
cutscene.sp: Pooh Oh. Hello there, Owl.
Owl Good day, Pooh. What are you doing? Using a balloon to get some honey? Splendid idea! Allow me to offer a few pointers.

cutscene.desc: He flies to a higher branch
cutscene.sp: Owl Ahem! Now, Pooh can get honey by floating up this tree with his balloon. The honey is inside the tree hollows, not the beehives you see here.

cutscene.desc: He flies to an even higher branch
cutscene.sp: Owl There’s quite a lot of honey in these holes. If Pooh gets too close, the bees will come out to protect their honey. If they get to Pooh, they’ll pop his balloon. Lock onto the bees and swat them away. The more time Pooh has at each hollow, the more honey he can eat. There’s more honey higher up, too. If jumping from branch to branch proves difficult, try the Rush command. Rush can help you catch up to Pooh quickly. But it isn’t fully reliable. Good luck.

cutscene.desc: Sora helps toss Pooh into the air and he floats up the tree, gathering honey. Sora swats away the bees that attack, letting Pooh enjoy his meal. Pooh grabs handfuls of honey in his mouth from inside the tree
cutscene.sp: Pooh (giggling) It is rather funny what I will do for honey.

cutscene.desc: Sora leaves the 100 Acre Wood with a summon gem in hand. He gives it to the Fairy Godmother
cutscene.sp: Fairy Godmother Oh, another summon gem? Let’s help this little one. Here we go! Bibbidi-bobbidi-boo!

cutscene.desc: Sora is granted the power to summon Bambi
cutscene.sp: Fairy Godmother If you find any more of these stones, bring them to me.

cutscene.desc: The leave Traverse Town and fly the gummi ship to the next world. Traveling through space, they come upon a strange gray object ahead
cutscene.sp: Donald What is that?
Sora Wow, it’s huge!

cutscene.desc: It flies over them
cutscene.sp: Goofy It’s a giant whale!
Jiminy It’s Monstro! He’s a whale of a whale, and vicious besides!

cutscene.desc: It flies back around
cutscene.sp: Donald Whoa! Sora, get us out of here!

cutscene.desc: It makes its way toward them, opening its enormous jaw, revealing a mouth full of teeth
cutscene.sp: Sora Too late! He’s going to swallow us!

cutscene.desc: It overtakes the ship and Sora’s life flashes before his eyes. He remembers a day, 9 years ago, that he spent with Riku on the Destiny Islands. He walks down the stairs with Riku, his small hands folded behind his back
cutscene.sp: Sora It’s true! I saw it with my own eyes!
Riku You sure you didn’t just hear it this time?
Sora What difference does it make? There’s a huge monster in there, I tell you!
Riku All right. Suppose there really is a monster... Think we can beat it by ourselves, Sora?
Sora No problem. Let’s do it!

cutscene.desc: They walk to the entrance of the Secret Place
cutscene.sp: Sora Listen! There! Can you hear it growling?
Riku Shh, quiet.

cutscene.desc: Riku bends closer, listening over the sounds of the waterfall nearby
cutscene.sp: Riku We’ve gotta be careful.

cutscene.desc: They enter slowly and the sounds of the waterfall drift away. They find nothing in the empty cave apart from a hole in the ceiling that air was pushing through
cutscene.sp: Riku See that? It was just the wind making that noise.
Sora Aw, man. I wish it was a monster! Hold on! What’s that over there?

cutscene.desc: He looks over to see a wooden part of the cave wall. Riku inspects it closely
cutscene.sp: Riku A window, or maybe a door? It won’t open.
Sora (looking around at the empty walls) Geez, is that really all that’s in here?
Riku What do you expect in a boring place like this?

cutscene.desc: Sora continues searching the cave
cutscene.sp: Riku Hey, Sora.
Sora (looking back at him) Hm?
Riku When we grow up, let’s get off this island. We’ll go on real adventures, not this kid stuff!

cutscene.desc: Riku’s eyes grow wide with anticipation
cutscene.sp: Sora Sure. But isn’t there anything fun to do now? Hey, you know the new girl at the mayor’s house? Did you hear?

cutscene.desc: Sora exits the cave, with Riku following, and the scene turns back to the present, the sounds of the wind becoming the sounds from Monstro the whale, where Sora, Donald, and Goofy have been thrown from the ship inside its mouth. Sora lies on the ground, hearing a yell
cutscene.sp: Donald Knock it off!

cutscene.desc: Sora shakes his head and stands up to meet Donald and Goofy. Goofy is covering his head with his shield again while Donald taps his foot on the damp floor
cutscene.sp: Goofy Hey, Sora. Are you okay?
Sora What are you guys doing? Where are we, anyway?

cutscene.desc: He looks around before an item comes flying from overhead. Sora dodges backward
cutscene.sp: Sora Whoa!
Goofy Uh, ya know, I think that big ol’ whale Monstro just swallowed us. And for today’s weather: expect showers.

cutscene.desc: Another item falls and hits Goofy’s shield
cutscene.sp: Goofy Heavy showers!

cutscene.desc: Donald continues to look up at someone on a high ledge, searching through a treasure chest
cutscene.sp: Donald Hey! Who’s there?

cutscene.desc: A wooden puppet looks down at them from the ledge
cutscene.sp: Pinocchio It’s me.
Donald Oh, it’s just Pinocchio. ...Pinocchio!?

cutscene.desc: Jiminy jumps onto Sora’s shoulder
cutscene.sp: Jiminy Pinocchio?

cutscene.desc: Pinocchio begins walking down the ledge away from them carrying a large gummi block
cutscene.sp: Jiminy Pinocch, where are you going? Pinocch! Come on, everybody! After him! Quick!

cutscene.desc: Pinocchio hops along the various wood piles scattered throughout Monstro’s enormous mouth. Sora, Donald, and Goofy makes their way over to a wooden boat where Pinocchio is talking to an old man
cutscene.sp: ???????? What have you got there, Pinocchio?

cutscene.desc: Pinocchio sets the green block down on the deck
cutscene.sp: Pinocchio With this, we can get out of her, Father.
???????? Really? With this big block? You think so?
Sora It’s true.

cutscene.desc: They turn to see Sora, Donald, and Goofy climbing the edge of the ship
cutscene.sp: Sora So, how did you end up here, Pinocchio?

cutscene.desc: They stand onto the deck
cutscene.sp: ???????? Oh, my. So the whale swallowed all of you, too? My goodness.
Sora Yeah, looks like it.
???????? My name is Geppetto. I’m Pinocchio’s father. When we got separated, I traveled all over, looking for him.

cutscene.desc: Pinocchio is distracted by something behind him and he walks over the plank
cutscene.sp: Geppetto Thank goodness we’re together again.

cutscene.desc: The puppet sees someone running further into the whale as Geppetto picks up the gummi block
cutscene.sp: Geppetto So, you seem to know Pinocchio quite well. I hope he was a good boy in my absence.

cutscene.desc: He places the block near his bed as a goldfish swims in its bowl on the bedside table
cutscene.sp: Geppetto Well, we’ve all had quite a journey. Right, Pinocchio?

cutscene.desc: He looks around for his son
cutscene.sp: Geppetto Pinocchio? I warned him not to wander off here. He can be a naughty boy. Even so, he’s very precious to me.

cutscene.desc: Sora, Donald and Goofy go after Pinocchio, finding him hiding in an inner chamber
cutscene.sp: Sora What are you doing? Come on, let’s go back.
Goofy You know, Geppetto’s awfully worried about you.
Sora (sternly) Pinocchio, stop fooling around! This is no time for games!

cutscene.desc: They start to turn away
cutscene.sp: Riku But, Sora, I thought you liked games.

cutscene.desc: Sora whirls around to see Riku
cutscene.sp: Riku Or are you too cool to play them now that you have the Keyblade?
Sora Riku! Wh-What are you doing here?
Riku Just playing with Pinocchio.
Sora You know what I mean! What about Kairi? Did you find her?
Riku Maybe. Catch us and maybe I’ll tell you what I know.
Sora Come on!

cutscene.desc: Riku grabs Pinocchio’s hand and leads him further into Monstro. They search through the various maze-like innards of the whale, fighting numerous Heartless, though finding no trace of Riku or the puppet. Maleficent appears to Riku
cutscene.sp: Maleficent Why do you still care about that boy? He has all but deserted you for the Keyblade and his new companions, after all.
Riku I don’t care about him. I was just messing with him a little.
Maleficent Oh, really? Of course you were.

cutscene.desc: She smiles
cutscene.sp: Maleficent Beware the darkness in your heart. The Heartless prey upon it.

cutscene.desc: She summons a corridor of darkness and walks into it
cutscene.sp: Riku Mind your own business.

cutscene.desc: He stares at her as she leaves. Sora, Donald, and Goofy chase Pinocchio, who passes by Riku into the bowels of the beast
